org.drools.ruleflow.core
Interface MilestoneNode

All Superinterfaces:
Node, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
MilestoneNodeImpl
public interface MilestoneNode
extends Node

Represents a milestone in a RuleFlow. A milestone has an associated constraint. Flow will only continue if this constraint has been satisfied.

 

Method Summary

          Returns the constraint of the MilestoneNode.
